Laravel 知识整理

no branches ready for upload

You must do the following steps:

$ repo abandon <branch> <project>
$ repo start <branch> <project>
$ git reset --hard <latest-github-commit-id>
  (git add/commit)
$ repo upload <project>

∞ 发布日期：2013-04-15

∞ 发布目录：git

∞ 发布标签：Git

∞ 永久连接：http://fanshine.github.io/laravelLearningBlog//2013-04-15/no-branches-ready-for-upload.html
